tasks.title: Build Hello World HTML page with styled button
tasks.description:
Implementation steps:
1. Create index.html file in /root/Playground_AI_Dev directory
2. Include basic HTML5 boilerplate with <!DOCTYPE html>
3. Add <h1> heading with "Hello World" text
4. Create a <button> element with "Click Me" text
5. Style the button with CSS: padding, background-color, color, border-radius, and hover effect
6. Write CSS inline in <style> tag or as embedded styles
7. Test the page by opening it in a browser
